Tools for working with row names

Source: R/rownames.R
rownames.Rd

Tools for working with row names

rownames_to_column(.data, var = "rowname")

Arguments

.data

A data.frame.
var

character(1). The name of the column to use for row names.

Value

A data.frame

Examples

mtcars %>% rownames_to_column()

#>                rowname  mpg cyl  disp  hp drat    wt  qsec vs am gear carb
